post.body: That's a given. =)
I took most of their resources away.
Then I wouldn't be able to nap. :P
Ooooh. Pretty sunrise.
Still haven't cooked dinner. Dishwasher is taking care of needed dinner pot while I watch Maid in Manhattan. Why do I like JLo movies?
So far it's just been... a day. Hubby has requested pasta for dinner. I'm assuming spaghetti. Meh.
Blargh. Thinking it's nap time.
Mostly quiet morning so far. This is a good thing. Leftover soup is a good breakfast.
Ice cream has been acquired. B&J's halfbaked is smoothing out the end of what's been a rough day. Mmmmm.
Split pea soup was yummy. Going to bug Josh now. there may be ice cream.
Hubby going through boxes to get rid of crap. Just found bottle of prenatal pills I tried to take when pregnant with Morgan. Packratting ftl
Er, tuesday night queue. Even worse!
Monday night. 200+ queue for Feathermoon. Not a good sign. :P
Making very late dinner. Sorta got a nap. Boys kicking wals = grounded to room boys.
I hear kids plotting in the hallway, how to get over the wall of babygates instead of taking their nap. Toy bins might have to be locked up.
6yro is not as dense as he pretends. He's almost as devious and resourceful as his little brother.
Colorforms are just as fun at 37 as they were at 5. Who knew!
Got WoW addons on laptop now. Lets see how much my laptop hates WoW now. Fewer than I use on the desktop still. Just the essentials. :P
They're gone. YAY! I never realize how quiet having just 2 kids is until I have 5 to watch. :P
Free from excess kids soon. It can't come soon enough.
